code: @Override protected Response newResponse() {     return new Response(). }

@Override protected void masterOperation(Request request, ClusterState state, ActionListener<Response> listener) {     IndexLifecycleMetadata metadata = state.metaData().custom(IndexLifecycleMetadata.TYPE).     final Response response.     if (metadata == null) {         // no need to actually install metadata just yet, but safe to say it is not stopped         response = new Response(OperationMode.RUNNING).     } else {         response = new Response(metadata.getOperationMode()).     }     listener.onResponse(response). }
@Override protected ClusterBlockException checkBlock(Request request, ClusterState state) {     return state.blocks().globalBlockedException(ClusterBlockLevel.METADATA_WRITE). }
